# Controller High-Speed Machining

> **Skill ID:** `prism-controller-high-speed`
> **Category:** CONTROLLER
> **Version:** 2.0.0

## Description

HSM functions and lookahead

## Capabilities

- Handle high-speed machining for all controller families

## Usage

This skill provides expertise in controller high-speed machining.

### When to Use

- When working with controller
- When needing controller high-speed machining capabilities
